name: Coins Of Equality
description:
An adventure game made for GMTK Game Jam 2022. We can't finish it in time, so there is not much to do. The game is looking good, the music is a pro work too, so I didn't want to waste all of these. Just play the game and enjoy the atmosphere.

You can collect money and dices, from the objects in the map, and you can play the dice minigame, if you click to the npc at spawn point.

Programming - Máté Pojbics

Enviroment Art - Regina Izsai

Animations - Dénes Királyházi

Music - Bogi Erdős
